content.rendered:
Directed by Sooraj R. Barjatya

Written by Abhishek Dixit.

Cast Amitabh Bachchan (Amit Shrivastav). Anupam Kher (Om Sharma). Boman Irani (Javed Siddiqui). Parineeti Chopra (Shraddha Gupta). Neena Gupta (Shabina Siddiqui). Sarika Thakur (Mala Trivedi (as Sarika)). Danny Denzongpa (Bhupen). Nafisa Ali (Abhilasha Shrivastav (as Nafisa Ali Sodhi)). Pranav Sachdev (Siddharth Sharma (as Pranav Sachdeva)). Sheen Das (Heeba Khan (as Sheen Dass)). Abhishek Singh (Vali Khan). Shanti Tiwari (Neha Sharma). Rahul Nawach Mukhia (Sunny – Asst. Trek Guide). Raju Kher (Guddu Sharma – Om’s Brother). Manoj Tandon (Manohar Sharma – Om’s Brother). Seema Thariani (Om’s Elder Bhabhi). Baljeet Kaur (Om’s Younger Bhabhi). Lokesh Mittal (Property Broker). Lavinder Khurana (Abhilasha’s Brother). Micky Makhija (Doctor in Nepal). Khuman Nongyai (Som – Bhupen’s Caretaker). Raj Singh Rawat (Qasim – Javed’s Shop Assistant). Ajay Dutta (Bhupen’s Doctor). Amit Saproo (Amit’s Doctor (as Amit Sapru)). Sneha Adhikari (Teenage Mala). Saroj Tamu (Teenage Bhupen). Deependra Chauhan (Trekker). Pranav Mehra (Trekker (as Pranav Naveen Mehra)). Monika Negi (Trekker). Dharana Khemraj Sharma (Trekker (as Dharana Sharma)). Shalin Thakur (Trekker). Garima Verma (Trekker). Hardip Dhupia (Sr. Chef at Bhupen’s Party). Girish Sharma (Jr. Chef at Bhupen’s Party). Bibek Khadka (Chopper Pilot). Garima Bajaj (Hotel Receptionist). Aaron Gurung (Young Bhupen). Ayusha Subedi (Young Mala). Arjun Mehra (Photographer at Party). Vivaan Modi (Photographer’s Assistant). Afrah Sayed (Photographer’s Assistant)

Language Hindi

Producers Natasha Malpani Oswal.

Production Boundless Media. Mahaveer Jain Films. Rajshri Productions
